description:
Prince of Albion and http://anidb.net/ch4057 [Henrietta]`s cousin. He and Henrietta had a romantic relationship but is faced with their status as cousins. His vow to the water spirits is to one day be able to show his feelings to Henrietta without needing to hide it from the public.
He is killed by http://anidb.net/ch39519 [Wardes] in the first season but is later revived in the second season to abduct Henrietta to Albion. He is then killed once again.
Wales is a triangle wind mage and he showed that nobles of royal heritage can combine their magical power with other royals to create power above pentagram grade (possibly up to decagram grade with two pentagram mages).
Source: wiki
name: Wales Tudor
